articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Microsoft turns 50 today, and it made me think about MS-DOS 5.0 - Ars Technica
articles.description: A story about an obsolete PC, an old library book, and a one version of MS-DOS.

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Microsoft’s Copilot can now browse the web and perform actions for you - TechCrunch
articles.description: For its 50th birthday, Microsoft is teaching its AI-powered Copilot chatbot a few new tricks.
articles.content:
For its 50th birthday, Microsoft is teaching its AI-powered Copilot chatbot a few new tricks.
Copilot can now take action on “most websites,” Microsoft says, enabling it to book tickets, reserve res… [+3950 chars]
